definition: a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)

sentences.english: The results indicated that gonorrhoea was related with infection of toxoplasma gondii.
sentences.chinese: 提示淋病患者存在合并弓形虫感染的可能性。

sentences.english: Still another condition is called a bowing fracture.
An optional bow member clips about the pinna.
sentences.chinese: 可选用的弓形件夹设在耳廓的周围。

sentences.english: In recent year, it is found that the part etiology of ophthalmopathy is associated with toxoplasmosis infection.
sentences.chinese: 近年研究还发现一些眼病与弓形虫感染有病因学联系。

sentences.english: The survival time of mice after immunization with the combined plasmids after challenging with the ZS_2 tachyzoites was prolonged.
sentences.chinese: 混合质粒注射和小鼠抗弓形虫感染的存活时间延长。

sentences.english: The iron rod supports the valance is bent in an arc.
sentences.chinese: 挂窗帘上部短幔的铁棍弯成了个弓形。

sentences.english: Toxoplasmosis is one kind of parasitosis recognized recently and the etiology and clinical knowledge should be improved.
sentences.chinese: 弓形虫病是近代认识的寄生虫病。

sentences.english: Conclusion The antimicrobial peptides extracted from M. domestica have anti-Toxoplasma activity.
sentences.chinese: 结论提取的血淋巴中含有抑制弓形虫的成分。

sentences.english: Dr Flegr has studied several aspects of the Toxoplasma question.
sentences.chinese: 弗莱格博士研究过弓形虫问题的诸多方面。

sentences.english: The arch died away against the towers.
sentences.chinese: 弓形结构与塔状结构相衔接。

sentences.english: Humans can acquire toxoplasmosis in one of three ways.
sentences.chinese: 人类可以通过三种途径感染弓形虫病。

sentences.english: Her Cupid-bow mouth pouted to give him an airy kiss.
sentences.chinese: 她的丘比特弓形嘴努起，给了他一个轻盈的吻。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the short-term state of Toxoplasma gondii in infertile patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨不孕不育人群弓形虫近期感染情况。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To studied prevalence of Toxoplasma Gondi infection in pregnant women and influenced factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的调查孕妇的弓形虫感染状况及其影响因素。
她同样推荐鞋底有弓形结构的鞋子。

sentences.english: The iron rod supporting the valances was bent in an arc.
sentences.chinese: 挂窗帘上部短幔的铁棍弯成了个弓形。

definition: to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
to hunch over/to stoop/to arch one's back (upward)
shape resembling the character 八 or 8/V-shape/splayed/figure of eight
vertical/to erect/to set upright/vertical stroke in Chinese characters/young servant (old)
